Name: Maria Theresa Margarita
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Review: Originally sweetened with sugar syrup, this is better smoothed with honey.
History: Adapted from a recipe created by Victor J. Bergeron and published in his 1972 Trader Vic's Bartender's Guide Revised .
Nutrition: One serving of Maria Theresa Margarita contains 178 calories
